answers.answer: I was wondering the same thing because I'm 34 weeks & 2 days
Most of the time no. For many places the last ultrasound is done at 20 weeks unless there's a problem or concern.
It really depends on your doc. I get an ultra sound every 2 weeks but because my doctor is very thorough with her patience.
My doctor says I get one more ultrasound at 34 weeks!
I should think so, ive got one at 36weeks, i think you have one usually between 34 and 37 weeks, not sure though.
I had an ultrasound at the end of my pregnancy to check fluid levels, position of baby etc. It was at 36 or 37 weeks I believe
I'm getting my last one next week I'll be 34 weeks
I get one on the 17th of this month to check my daughters weight. But I have gestational diabetes and if I didn't I probably wouldn't get one. I'll be 36 weeks then.

question: Do we get one last ultrasound in our third trimester for a estimate weight n growth scan?
title: just curious
